## FingerprintReader.onDeviceConnected property

An event handler for the [DeviceConnected](./devices.deviceconnected.md) event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onDeviceConnected: Handler<DeviceConnected>;
```

## Remarks

This is a unicast subscription, i.e. only one handler can be registered at once. For multicast subscription use [FingerprintReader.on()](./devices.fingerprintreader.on.md) and [FingerprintReader.off()](./devices.fingerprintreader.off.md)<!-- -->.
